item.title: [HADOOP-16701] Fix broken links in site index
item.description: Fix links to removed/unexisting pages in site index.
item.summary: Fix broken links in site index

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Thanks iwasakims for the patch.

  • YARN registry was moved to Hadoop common and its document was moved to "hadoop-project-dist/hadoop-common/registry/index.html" in HADOOP-15821. Would you add a link to common registry?
  • In Tencent COS, markdown is available https://github.com/apache/hadoop/blob/trunk/hadoop-cloud-storage-project/hadoop-cos/site/markdown/cloud-storage/index.md but it doesn't seem to be compiled. I think this can be fixed in a separate jira.

Thanks for the comment, aajisaka.

In Tencent COS, markdown is available https://github.com/apache/hadoop/blob/trunk/hadoop-cloud-storage-project/hadoop-cos/site/markdown/cloud-storage/index.md but it doesn't seem to be compiled. I think this can be fixed in a separate jira.

I filed HADOOP-16702 for this.
Thanks! Would you move the registry link from yarn section to common? I'm +1 if that is addressed.
I attached 003 moving the line to common section.

+1 overall
